QuestData.Title: Constellan Writ
QuestData.Description: <The writing on the scroll changes rapidly. It likely holds ancient secrets that Ve'nari may find intriguing.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Constellan Writ to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Ve'nari examines the writ.>
Quite an interesting way to record one's secrets. This may prove a challenge to decipher.
Thank you for bringing this to me.
